thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Taiwan's regulator says to impose more controls on insurers with larger FX losses

title: Taiwan's regulator says to impose more controls on insurers with larger FX losses
text:
April 19, 2018 / 4:11 AM / Updated 36 minutes ago Taiwan's regulator says to impose more controls on insurers with larger FX losses Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
TAIPEI, April 19 (Reuters) - Taiwan’s financial watchdog said on Thursday it will impose tighter controls over insurers with larger foreign exchange losses, without elaborating. 
Financial Supervisory Commission Chairman Wellington Koo told a parliamentary meeting that overseas investments of Taiwan’s insurance companies account for 65 percent of total investment. (Reporting by Emily Chan; Writing by Clare Jim; Editing by Jacqueline Wong)
